name: Holy Molluscamony
description:
Ey up

When your best friend's wedding is ruined by a slug monster with the powers of cloning (and all powers normally associated with slugs), it's up to you figure out which bride is your friend and which bride is a slightly sticky clone.

This was originally made for #AdvJam2017. Since then we've re-recorded all the voice work, added our own custom soundtrack and upgraded it to the latest version of our Hassle game engine to be a bonus episode in Yorkshire Gubbins. We're making this new improved version available available for nowt on Itch.io!

Yorkshire Gubbins

Yorkshire Gubbins is an anthology of point and click comedy adventures set in a really stupid version of Yorkshire, currently available on Steam. It includes Holy Molluscamony, Verb School (our tutorial episode) and our first Full Length episode Humble Pie which we hope to make available on Itch.io as a standalone game soon!

Instructions

This is a Verb Based Point and Click adventure. If you've never played one before, play Verb School online for free!  Failing that, just point and click to move around, click on verbs and objects in the world and your inventory. You'll figure it out. You're smart.
